article_title: Pete McMurray catches up with Flossmoor’s local Allstate agent!
article_text:
× Pete McMurray catches up with Flossmoor’s local Allstate agent!

Barbara Brown has been an Allstate agent for 26 years, serving the Homewood community and surrounding areas. She has two office locations. The Homewood office is located at 2405 W. 183rd Street and the Hazel Crest location is located at 18224 S. Kedzie Ave. Barbara was not able to join us however; her daughter, Alycia Brown is with us who is a member of her staff.

article_summary:
× Pete McMurray catches up with Flossmoor’s local Allstate agent!
Barbara Brown has been an Allstate agent for 26 years, serving the Homewood community and surrounding areas.
She has two office locations.
The Homewood office is located at 2405 W. 183rd Street and the Hazel Crest location is located at 18224 S. Kedzie Ave. Barbara was not able to join us however; her daughter, Alycia Brown is with us who is a member of her staff.
